HOOKWOOD_FARM.NAME: Hookwood Farm
HOOKWOOD_FARM.DESCRIPTION: A sprawling farm with golden wheat fields swaying in the breeze.

DAIRY_FARM.NAME: White Farm
DAIRY_FARM.DESCRIPTION: A rather lively, all-white wooden farmhouse with cows grazing peacefully.

POULTRY_FARM.NAME: The Old Beams
POULTRY_FARM.DESCRIPTION: An old farmhouse consisting of four buildings, each supported by four beams. In the middle is an old well.

GOLDEN_GLANS.NAME: Golden Glans
GOLDEN_GLANS.DESCRIPTION: A vibrant farm growing a variety of fresh vegetables.

IMON_ORCHARD.NAME: Imon Orchard
IMON_ORCHARD.DESCRIPTION: A lush orchard filled with fruit trees. Each fruit is an invitation to bite into!

MEUH_FARM.NAME: Meuh's Farm
MEUH_FARM.DESCRIPTION: A farm that has chosen to let its animals live as they see fit.

FLOWERS_YLISS.NAME: Flowers of Yliss
FLOWERS_YLISS.DESCRIPTION: A colorful farm growing beautiful flowers and herbs. Yliss leaves nothing to chance!

BLUE_JAYS.NAME: The Blue Jays
BLUE_JAYS.DESCRIPTION: A quaint farm known for its vibrant blue crops and peaceful ambiance.

GOLD_FIELDS.NAME: Gold Fiels
GOLD_FIELDS.DESCRIPTION: A fertile farm known for its abundant grain production and its golden hues.

BEYOND_HILL.NAME: Beyond Hill
BEYOND_HILL.DESCRIPTION: The farm is located just past a gentle hill, offering stunning views of the surrounding countryside.

SUNNY_ACRES.NAME: Sunny Acres
SUNNY_ACRES.DESCRIPTION: This farm is bathed in sunlight throughout the day, making it an ideal place to grow anything you want.

RIVERBEND_FARM.NAME: Riverbend Farm
RIVERBEND_FARM.DESCRIPTION: Situated along a gentle river bend, this farm benefits from rich soil and ample water supply.

MEADOWVIEW_FARM.NAME: Meadowview Farm
MEADOWVIEW_FARM.DESCRIPTION: Overlooking a picturesque meadow, this farm is known for its scenic beauty and bountiful harvests.

RANCH_WHISPERERS.NAME: Whispering Ranch
RANCH_WHISPERERS.DESCRIPTION: In the heart of the scorching desert, the Whispering Ranch survives thanks to hardy animals and mineral-rich sand. Its inhabitants know the secrets of the wind and the heat.

CLIFFSTEP_PASTURES.NAME: The Cliff Pastures
CLIFFSTEP_PASTURES.DESCRIPTION: Perched on rocky slopes, The Cliff Pastures raises cold-resistant animals. The rare grasses that grow here are highly prized.

MOSSLIGHT_GARDEN.NAME: The Moss Gardens
MOSSLIGHT_GARDEN.DESCRIPTION: In the damp undergrowth, The Moss Gardens cultivates luminescent mosses and exotic berries. A discreet but very fertile farm.

HEIGHTMILLS.NAME: Eight Mills
HEIGHTMILLS.DESCRIPTION: Eight Mills takes advantage of the constant winds of the plains to grind its grain and dry its fibers. A simple but prosperous farm.
